title.value: Detection and genomic analysis of BRAF fusions in Juvenile Pilocytic Astrocytoma through the combination and integration of multi‐omic data
title.justification: The title accurately reflects the main focus of the paper which is on detecting and analyzing BRAF fusions in Juvenile Pilocytic Astrocytoma using multi-omic data.
title.quote: Detection and genomic analysis of BRAF fusions in Juvenile Pilocytic Astrocytoma through the combination and integration of multi‐omic data

extractions.description: This paper discusses the use of RNA-Seq, linked-read whole-genome sequencing, and in situ Hi-C methods to detect and analyze BRAF fusions in Juvenile Pilocytic Astrocytoma (JPA). It identifies novel BRAF fusion partners and examines the 3D genome architecture in JPA.

type.justification: The paper includes experimental methodologies such as RNA-Seq and Hi-C for data collection and analysis, indicating it is empirical.
type.quote: To this effect, we applied RNA-Seq as well as linked-read whole-genome sequencing and in situ Hi-C as new approaches...

name.justification: The primary focus of the research is on the genomic analysis of cancer, specifically Juvenile Pilocytic Astrocytoma.
name.quote: Background: Juvenile Pilocytic Astrocytomas (JPAs) are one of the most common pediatric brain tumors...

name.justification: The paper focuses on genomics, using sequencing techniques to analyze gene fusions in JPAs.
name.quote: We demonstrate the power of integrating multi-omic datasets to identify low frequency fusions and characterize the JPA genome at high resolution.

name.justification: The study is specifically about Juvenile Pilocytic Astrocytoma, which is a pediatric brain tumor.
name.quote: Juvenile Pilocytic Astrocytomas (JPAs) are one of the most common pediatric brain tumors...

name.justification: The paper mentions generating in situ Hi-C libraries from primary JPA tumor samples.
name.quote: We also generated in situ Hi-C libraries from primary JPA tumor samples...

referenced_paper_title.value: A 3D Map of the Human Genome at Kilobase Resolution Reveals Principles of Chromatin Looping
referenced_paper_title.justification: The methodological basis for the Hi-C approach in the study likely references Rao et al., which provided substantial groundwork for Hi-C techniques.
referenced_paper_title.quote: In situ Hi-C libraries were generated from 5 million dissociated and fixed cells from JPAs primary tumor samples as described in Rao et al. with minor modifications [31].

name.value: Single-cell RNA sequencing of mouse cerebellum atlas
name.justification: The paper references using a mouse cerebellum atlas to inspect gene expression related to JPA.
name.quote: We used the developing mouse cerebellum atlas [40] to inspect the expression of BRAF and its fusion partner genes...

referenced_paper_title.value: Childhood cerebellar tumours mirror conserved fetal transcriptional programs
referenced_paper_title.justification: The referenced dataset stems from Vladoiu et al., which discusses transcriptional programs in pediatric cerebellar tumors.
referenced_paper_title.quote: We used the developing mouse cerebellum atlas [40]...

name.justification: The alignment tool STAR is used for processing RNA-Seq data in the study.
name.quote: Reads were aligned with STAR (v2.5.3a) [21] to reference GRCh38_gencode_v33_CTAT_lib_Apr062020...

aliases: Spliced Transcripts Alignment to a Reference

referenced_paper_title.justification: The STAR aligner is used for aligning RNA-Seq reads in the paper, originally published by Dobin et al.

name.justification: Arriba is used as one of the fusion callers in the RNA-Seq pipeline.
name.quote: Fusions were called with three different fusion callers; ... Arriba v1.2.0...

referenced_paper_title.value: Accurate and efficient detection of gene fusions from RNA sequencing data
referenced_paper_title.justification: Arriba is a tool used for detecting gene fusions in RNA-Seq data, and its development is documented in a paper by Uhrig et al.

name.justification: InFusion is among the fusion callers used in the study for RNA-Seq data analysis.
name.quote: Fusions were called with three different fusion callers; ... 3) InFusion (v0.8.1-dev)...

referenced_paper_title.value: InFusion: Advancing Discovery of Fusion Genes and Chimeric Transcripts from Deep RNA-Sequencing Data
referenced_paper_title.justification: InFusion is used for fusion analysis in the paper, as originally described in Okonechnikov et al.
referenced_paper_title.quote: InFusion (v0.8.1-dev) using a relaxed sets of parameters...

name.justification: LongRanger is used for alignment and variant calling of linked-read data.
name.quote: Alignment and variant calling was done using 10x Genomics’ pipeline (LongRanger)...

referenced_paper_title.value: Haplotyping germline and cancer genomes with high-throughput linked-read sequencing
referenced_paper_title.justification: LongRanger's role in the analysis, as a part of linked-reads methodology from 10x Genomics, is significant and comes from works like Zheng et al.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Alignment and variant calling was done using 10x Genomics’ pipeline (LongRanger), which uses the barcode-aware aligner, Lariat.
